snippet: A new mode of environmental thinking emphasizes that the movement might as well reconcile the needs of people with the needs of nature, given that humankind has irreversibly transformed the planet anyway.
abstract: A new mode of environmental thinking emphasizes that the movement might as well reconcile the needs of people with the needs of nature, given that humankind has irreversibly transformed the planet anyway.

headline.main: On Our Radar: Eco-Pragmatists on the Rise
